Disputes included India's "no-handshake" policy, political dedications, and controversial gestures by Pakistani players, resulting in fines and protests.

description: A stampede at actor-turned-politician Vijay's rally in Karur, Tamil Nadu, killed 39 people, including 10 children and 17 women, and injured 81. The tragedy occurred Saturday night amidst a massive crowd, with panic ensuing after disturbances and floodlight failures. An inquiry commission has been ordered, and ex-gratia payments announced.

title: North Carolina shooting: Passing boat opens fire at Southport eatery; 3 dead
description: Three people were killed and eight injured after a shooter opened fire from a passing boat at the American Fish Company restaurant in Southport, North Carolina, on Saturday night. The unidentified vessel fired into a crowd of diners before fleeing the scene. Authorities are questioning one person of interest as the investigation continues into the deadly incident.

This chaotic incident, widely discussed on social media, starkly highlighted how intense sports passion can dangerously spill beyond the field.

description: Tamil Nadu DGP G Venkataraman explained the Karur rally stampede. He cited actor-politician Vijay's delayed arrival as the cause. A large crowd waited hours in the sun without food or water. Vijay's party Twitter handle announced an earlier arrival time. This led to an unexpected surge of nearly 27,000 people. Police deployment was for 20,000, not the actual turnout.

description: A 40-year-old man was arrested in Meerut for allegedly strangling his 14-year-old daughter and dumping her body in a canal. He confessed to the crime, stating he was angered by her taking Rs 500 without permission, which he considered 'stealing'. The girl's mother revealed her husband misled her about their daughter's whereabouts and later threatened her.

The 62-year-old allegedly exploited economically weaker students by seizing their phones and certificates, creating fear. His bail plea was rejected, with a court noting custodial interrogation is vital to unravel the extensive fraud and intimidation pattern.

title: BMW accident: CCTV footage helps main accused Gaganpreet Makkad get bail
description: Gaganpreet Makkad, accused in a fatal BMW accident, received bail after CCTV footage challenged the prosecution's direct ramming claim. The court noted the car lost control and flipped, suggesting rash driving. It also criticized a DTC bus, ambulance driver, and paramedic for their unprofessional conduct at the scene.

description: Canada is seizing a major opportunity as the US imposes a steep $100,000 H-1B visa fee under Trump. Prime Minister Mark Carney has pledged new measures to attract skilled Indian workers priced out of the US. With Europe also competing, Canada’s large Indian diaspora and clear pathways to citizenship make it an increasingly attractive destination for global talent.

title: Dugong redux

Rajaram examine what measures facilitated the return of these sea cows, and what more needs to be done, even as international recognition comes Tamil Nadu’s way

title: ‘Putin visit planned’: Lavrov confirms December trip to New Delhi

He also reiterated Russia's strong support for India's permanent seat on the UN Security Council, advocating for global representation.

With five wickets in four games, India will hope their “smiling assassin” rediscovers his spark and delivers when it matters most.

‘It was like a human flood’: Survivors recall horror of Vijay rally stampede in Karur
description: A stampede at a TVK rally in Karur was intensified by blocked escape routes due to hoardings and ropes, which also fell and injured attendees. An unexpectedly large crowd, including people from distant districts, led to chaos, trapping many and causing fatalities. The situation worsened when a bakery roof, used for rescue, collapsed.

title: The mood changed in minutes in Karur: Cheering Vijay supporters left mourning; 39 dead
description: Karur was rocked by a tragic stampede Saturday night, killing 38 people, including women and children, and leaving families inconsolable. The overwhelmed Karur GH is receiving support from special medical teams and 100 ambulances. Police had earlier suggested an alternative, safer venue for the campaign where the incident occurred.

Congress hit back, claiming AAP's foundation was RSS-backed and it seized power with false accusations. Meanwhile, Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge condemned the Centre's handling of the situation. He demanded a judicial inquiry into police firing in Ladakh.

These highly mobile systems, developed by DRDO, will detect and destroy aerial threats over 30km, providing crucial air defence cover for troops and replacing older systems, especially after recent border hostilities.

India's representative further lambasted Pakistan, citing its history of sheltering terrorists and sponsoring groups like 'The Resistance Front' responsible for attacks. New Delhi asserted accountability for terrorists and their sponsors, rejecting third-party mediation.

title: Robbery at Mary Kom’s Faridabad house: Burglars loot taps, inverter battery
description: Olympic medalist Mary Kom's locked home in Surajkund was burgled earlier this week, with thieves accessing it through a vacant plot and a broken terrace window. Police confirmed gold items, taps, and an inverter battery are missing. An investigation is underway, but a formal complaint is awaited from Kom, who is currently out of station.

More than seven decades of science for peace
description: The European Organization for Nuclear Research – you probably know it by its acronym CERN – came into existence on September 29, 1954. For over seven decades now, the intergovernmental organisation has been vocal in its call for science for peace, while probing the fundamental structure of particles that make up everything around us. In addition to major achievements in particle physics, the organisation has also been home to innovations and inventions that you might not readily associate with it. A.S.Ganesh offers a quick timeline delineating some of its major achievements...

Police registered an FIR, and an investigation is underway into the tragic incident.

All victims are now recovering in the hospital, and Venkatesh has been arrested for attempted murder.

Her mother, Paris Fury, confirmed the news on Instagram. Noah Price holds an East Midlands belt. The couple made their relationship public earlier this year.

H-1B visa fees hike: Startup CEO challenges move; claims it will favour tech firms
description: Box CEO Aaron Levie has strongly criticised President Trump's new $100,000 H-1B visa fee, warning it grants large tech companies an unfair advantage over cash-strapped startups in the global talent acquisition race. Levie argued the steep cost transforms international hiring into a 'spending game' smaller firms cannot win, potentially pushing innovation overseas. He advocated for a significantly lower $20,000 fee and a broader reform framework with flexible visa caps, aiming to attract top global talent while safeguarding American wages.

title: 'He stayed the same': Gisele Bündchen reveals why she left Leonardo DiCaprio
description: Gisele Bundchen, post-divorce from Tom Brady, reflects on her past high-profile relationship with Leonardo DiCaprio, revealing it ended due to differing life paths. She also recalls meeting Brady, whom she married in 2009 before their 2022 divorce. Bundchen now lives a comfortable life with her new boyfriend, Joaquim Valente.

title: Accenture fired 11,000+ employees; CEO Julie Sweet warns, exit or ....
description: Accenture laid off over 11,000 employees globally in three months, citing rapid AI adoption and slowing corporate demand. These cuts are part of an $865 million restructuring, with more exits anticipated as the company aligns its workforce with AI-driven solutions and invests in agentic AI training. Despite the layoffs, Accenture reported a 7% revenue increase.

title: 'They didn’t want a Black character': Gabrielle Union on film rejection
description: Gabrielle Union, wife of Dwyane Wade, recently spoke about facing discrimination in Hollywood. She revealed being rejected for a role due to her ethnicity. Union wanted to be in 'Sugar and Spice' but was turned down. She also discussed beauty standards and how they affected her career. Despite challenges, Union has achieved success. Her marriage with Wade inspires many.
